description: Delicious Yorkshire puddings just in time for Christmas.
name: Traditional Yorkshire Puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat together eggs and milk until smooth. Sift flour into large bowl with a generous pinch of salt.
Make well in middle of flour and mix the wet ingredients into the dry, whisking to form a smooth batter.
Mix in chilled water until consistency is like cream. Leave at room temperature for 15 mins.
Whilst the batter is resting add 1 tbs of oil to each hole of a 12hole muffin tray, place in the oven for 10 minutes to bake.

Remove tray from oven and carefully and evenly pour the batter into the muffin tray. Place the tray back in the oven and cook for 1520 minutes until the puddings have raised up and browned. Watch the puddings towards end of the cooking time, but don't open oven or remove until they're golden otherwise they will collapse. Serve immediately.
